citations.narrative:
The facility has adequate space and/or dogs housed in compatible groups, however a written Exercise Plan for Dogs that
has been approved by the attending veterinarian was not available at the time of inspection. Having a written plan of
exercise approved by the attending veterinarian helps ensure dogs have adequate opportunity for exercise. Ensure to
maintain a written exercise plan for dogs that has been approved by the attending veterinarian.
Correct by February 29, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.8 
   
Exercise for dogs. 
The facility has adequate space and/or dogs housed in compatible groups, however a written Exercise Plan for Dogs that 
has been approved by the attending veterinarian was not available at the time of inspection. Having a written plan of 
exercise approved by the attending veterinarian helps ensure dogs have adequate opportunity for exercise. Ensure to 
maintain a written exercise plan for dogs that has been approved by the attending veterinarian.  
 
Correct by February 29, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
